articles.title: NFL Draft 2020: Kyle Dugger is a Division II star who’s worth the risk - SB Nation
articles.description: Dugger destroyed DII competition at Lenoir-Rhyne. His combine numbers suggest he can hold up in the NFL.
articles.content:
The NFLs next great young safety may not come from LSU, Clemson, or Alabama. Instead, he may have spent the last five years lighting the South Atlantic Conference on fire at Division II Lenoir-Rhyne University.
